controllers

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.PlayerController

  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle player movement and rendering

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerController(Player player)
      Instantiates a new playerController used for controlling the player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerController

        public PlayerController(Player player)
        Instantiates a new playerController used for controlling the player.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(Direction dir,
                 MapController mc)
        Takes a direction and determines if the player can move into the desired cell based on their inventory
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction the player is attempting to move
        mc - the map controller to find the Cell in that dir

      • createInventory

        public void createInventory(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Method to create the player inventory
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner used to get the inventory values

      • checkStatus

        public boolean checkStatus(MapController map)
        Check if the cell requires a shoe type and if the player posseses it
        Parameters:
        map - The MapController used to check if the player is on a fire or water cell
        Returns:
        a boolean value, if true, the player is on a block which kills the player, otherwise player is still alive

      • checkGoal

        public boolean checkGoal(MapController map)
        Check if player is on a goal cell
        Parameters:
        map - MapController object required to check if the current players position is on a goal.
        Returns:
        Boolean value returns true when the player is on a Goal cell

      • getPlayerPos

        public Vector getPlayerPos()
        Method to return the players vector position.
        Returns:
        Returns the vector of the players current position

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Returns the object of the player
        Returns:
        The player object

      • renderPlayer

        public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane renderPlayer()
        Renders the player
        Returns:
        GridPane filled with blank panes except the middle which is filled with a Pane consisting of the players image asset.

      • export

        public java.lang.String[] export()
        Method to get a int array {X,Y,fireShoes, flippers,tokens, red, green,blue,yellow}
        Returns:
        an array of ints representing the players position and inventory
